DOC.brief_summary: This trial treatment tablet contain magnesium leg cramps pregnancy .
DOC.brief_title: Does Oral Magnesium Substitution Relieve Pregnancy Induced Leg Cramps ?
DOC.detailed_description: Healthy pregnant woman 18 36 week pregnancy suffer leg cramp least twice week treated magnesium tablet placebo two week , 120 mg x 3 daily .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman recurrent leg cramp ( least twice week ) . No disease accord helath certificate . Written participation consent must sign . Linguistic ability demand : Norwegian first language . Gestation length 17 week , less 36 week . Twin pregnancy . Oedema . Preeclampsia . Magnesium supplementation beyond trial treatment .
